mapper.select: SELECT d.dogId, d.memberId, d.dogName, d.dogBreed, d.dogAge, d.dogWeight, d.dogGender, d.dogDrug, d.dogBlood, d.regDate, d.DELFLAG, m.id AS memberUsername, m.name AS memberName FROM dog d JOIN member m ON d.memberId = m.memberId WHERE d.DELFLAG = 'N'

SELECT d.dogId, d.memberId, d.dogName, d.dogBreed, d.dogAge, d.dogWeight, d.dogGender, d.dogDrug, d.dogBlood, d.regDate, d.DELFLAG, m.id AS memberUsername, m.name AS memberName FROM dog d JOIN member m ON d.memberId = m.memberId WHERE d.memberId = #{memberId} AND d.DELFLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dog (memberId, dogName, dogBreed, dogAge, dogWeight, dogGender, dogDrug, dogBlood, regDate, DELFLAG) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{dogName}, #{dogBreed}, #{dogAge}, #{dogWeight}, #{dogGender}, #{dogDrug}, #{dogBlood}, NOW(), 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT d.dogId, d.memberId, d.dogName, d.dogBreed, d.dogAge, d.dogWeight, d.dogGender, d.dogDrug, d.dogBlood, d.regDate, d.DELFLAG, m.id AS memberUsername, m.name AS memberName FROM dog d JOIN member m ON d.memberId = m.memberId WHERE d.dogId = #{dogId} AND d.DELFLAG = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE dog SET dogName = #{dogName}, dogBreed = #{dogBreed}, dogAge = #{dogAge}, dogWeight = #{dogWeight}, dogGender = #{dogGender}, dogDrug = #{dogDrug}, dogBlood = #{dogBlood} WHERE dogId = #{dogId}
